app.name: TCP Gecko
app.long_description:
A memory editor that does magical things to your games. In order to develop and apply real-time cheats use JGecko U.
Special thanks to: Chadderz, Marionumber1 - Original TCP Gecko Installer dimok - Homebrew Launcher kinnay - Diibugger pwsincd - Icon and XML CosmoCortney - Cheat code handler
